title: I have problem installing league of legends

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I cant install league of legneds on my new computer that uses windows 10.
This error pops out In the middle of the installation. 
Can somebody help me please?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Wow! it's been a while since I've seen this issue.

Are you sure you're using the most recent build of the installer? Please try downloading a fresh copy of the installer from the league website.
